meanings.sent1: The ruleless playground allowed kids to play freely.
meanings.sent2: The ruleless behavior of the students caused chaos in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The ruleless dance party turned into a wild celebration.
meanings.sent4: Her ruleless imagination knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The ruleless forest was a place of endless exploration.

meanings.definition: Not governed by rules or laws.
meanings.sent1: The ruleless land was a lawless territory.
meanings.sent2: The ruleless society descended into anarchy.
meanings.sent3: The ruleless cat refused to follow any instructions.
meanings.sent4: His ruleless spirit rebelled against any form of authority.
meanings.sent5: The ruleless ocean stretched out endlessly, free from restrictions.
